text: Category:CBS network shows Category:1970s American television series Category:1980s American television series Category:1990s American television series Category:2000s American television series Category:2010s American television series Category:American television news programs Category:English- language television programs CBS News Sunday Morning is an American television news magazine. It has aired on CBS since January 28, 1979. It was created by Robert Northshield and E.S. "Bud" Lamoreaux III, and original host Charles Kuralt. It currently airs Sundays between 9:00 a.m. to 10:30 a.m. EST, and between 6:00 a.m. to 7:30 a.m. It is currently hosted by Jane Pauley.
title: CBS News Sunday Morning
